title.narrative: Support to Government of Nepal to respond to climate change

description.narrative: The project is funded under the Global Climate Change Alliance to enable the Government of Nepal to adopt Climate Change policies and actions that increase the benefits and sustainability of public as well as public private development efforts.

participating-org.narrative: European Commission - Directorate-General for International Partnerships (INTPA)
European Commission - Directorate-General for International Partnerships (INTPA)

organisation.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to Nepal

department.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to Nepal

description.narrative: Nepal

policy-marker.narrative: Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention on Biological Diversity
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

title.narrative: Extent to which the capacity of the Government of Nepal (GoN) to support the design, implementation and monitoring of interventions aimed at bringing Climate Change (CC) into the mainstream has been strengthened

description.narrative: Extent to which the capacity of the Government of Nepal (GoN) to support the design, implementation and monitoring of interventions aimed at bringing Climate Change (CC) into the mainstream has been strengthened

title.narrative: Extent to which the capacity of the Government of Nepal (GoN) to support the design, implementation and monitoring of interventions aimed at bringing Climate Change (CC) into the mainstream has been strengthened

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.

baseline.value: The capacity of the GoN to develop, cost, budget and implement evidence-based policy and measures aimed at mainstreaming CC in key development sectors (agriculture, forestry, water and energy) is low

comment.narrative: The capacity of the GoN to develop, cost, budget and implement evidence-based policy and measures aimed at mainstreaming CC in key development sectors (agriculture, forestry, water and energy) is low

target.value: The capacity of the Government of Nepal (GoN) to support the design, implementation and monitoring of interventions aimed at bringing Climate Change (CC) into the mainstream is strengthened

comment.narrative: The capacity of the Government of Nepal (GoN) to support the design, implementation and monitoring of interventions aimed at bringing Climate Change (CC) into the mainstream is strengthened

actual.value: The technical and institutional capacity of the GoN to implement CC adaptation actions at local level has improved and so has its capacity to develop CC strategy at national level
